channel.title: Need help badly some annoying person!
channel.description:
Hai guys, i was wondering if its possible to ban someone, even though they have an ip changer... Thing is with this.. These are the 2 hostmasks/connectedFrom.
68-184-38-52.dhcp.oxfr.ma.charter.com c-98-200-241-86.hsd1.tx.comcast.net
Now, when i like, track to get a perm ip, it comes out with..
98.200.241.86 68.184.38.52
.. Now theyre in different states .. :S..
So like, with SYIpkpker, he has a dynamic IP, and people say you CANNOT ban him, yet Kevin/Guthan posted on rune-server, how to stop him perm.. So thats possible..
Is it possible with this situation? If so, how. Would really appreciate.
- P.S - Are UID's the same from every client, or does it vary for each person?

item.title: Need help badly some annoying person!
item.dc:creator: @runeite runeite
item.description:
@runeite wrote:

Hai guys, i was wondering if its possible to ban someone, even though they have an ip changer… Thing is with this… These are the 2 hostmasks/connectedFrom.

lmao!!! ip changer, rofl!!! dude syipkpker isnt 1 person its a program that many people use lol. I even have it, lets say i come on ur serv and hack it, and u ipban me, and if my friend has syipkpker, he can still hack ur serv lol.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help badly some annoying person!
